fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 advanced 146 points or 0.74% to settle at 19,979.15. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 1.59% to 11.79. HDFC Bank, Infosys and RIL were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The July 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 July 2023.
